title: nambinOrai
sahitya:
nambinOraik-kaiviDa mATTAn nAraNan karuNAsAgaran ennALum


anupallavi

  immai marumaiyum mummalam pOkkum shemmaiyuDait-tiruttAL paNindorumaiyuDan


caraNam    kadariya kariyai viraindE kAttAn padariya painkoDi mAnamum kATTAn
 adamanAm kanaka kashipuvai nashittu AdaravAga prahlAdanai aNaitta paraman
